#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;

        if(n<=2)
        {
            //pc3
            int p = 4*n;
            int count = p*(p-1)*(p-2)/6;
            cout<<p<<endl;
        }

        else if(n>=3)
        {
            //pc3-nc3
            int p =4*n;
            int a = p*(p-1)*(p-2)/6;
            int b = n*(n-1)*(n-2)/6;
            //these are the one which lie on the same line
            int count = a-4*b; //4 such lines
            cout<<count<<endl;
        }
    }
}
